title: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup:Set<Class<?> classSet is not expected
description: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup:Set<Class<?> The output is 'MySomeClass'.
OB: When running the code, the output is 'MySomeClass'.
EB: However, I expect the output to be 'MySomeClass'. This issue is not yet implemented in the Servlet 3.0 specification. The code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
SR: To reproduce:1. Run the code.2. Check the output and verify that it is 'MySomeClass' instead of 'MySomeClass'.
